STATIC_heading.text: REVIEW SHEET

STATIC_text.text: Write the meanings of the combining forms, suffi xes, and prefi xes in the spaces provided. Check your answers with the information in the chapter or in the Glossary (Medical Word Parts—English) at the end of this book.
Instructions: Click or tap on the plus sign to reveal the opposite side of the card.
Please visit the Evolve website for additional exercises, games, and images related to this chapter.
